Vanilla Aria Modals

Accessible modals written in vanilla Javascript with no dependencies.

Tricky Focus

Demonstrates tricky focus management on media players, stopping playback on close, and responsive size.

NOTE: Escape to close does not work when focus in on player controls.

Alternative Focus

Demonstrates using a custom onclick on the open element to define the first and return focus elements. (As oposed to the default focus behaviors applied by ArialModalPrep.js.)
